title: The Trashy PD Has To Survive as an Idol - Novel Updates
tags: Age Regression   Alternate World   Brotherhood   Clever Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Friendship   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Music   Parallel Worlds   Showbiz   System Administrator   Transported into a Game World   Younger Brothers
author: 문찐
description:
[Congratulations, Seo Hoyoon! You have been selected as a player in Nugu Idol Tycoon.] 

The bastard PD who everyone criticized has now become an unheard of idol in a parallel world.

The only person who remembers him completely is his brother.

To return to the original world, he must become the number one idol and clear the game!

“…Accept the quest.”
“Are you crazy?”
“Don’t I need to eat well to survive?”

His specialty is blackmailing, his hobby is conciliating.

The idol survival story of the evil PD who sticks to his job no matter what!>
